channel.title: this WEEK in TECH - MP3 Edition
channel.description: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital technology. Winner of the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award for best overall podcast and Best Technology Podcast. Released every Sunday at midnight Pacific.
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.itunes:author: Leo Laporte and the TWiTs
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in digital tech. 2005 People's Choice Podcast Award winner.
channel.itunes:summary: Your first podcast of the week is the last word in tech. Join Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, John C. Dvorak, and other tech luminaries in a roundtable discussion of the latest trends in high tech. Winner of People's Choice Podcast and Best Technology Podcast in the 2005 People's Choice Podcast Awards. Released every Sunday at midnight Pacific.
channel.itunes:keywords: twit, techtv, leo laporte, kevin rose, patrick norton, john c. dvorak

item.title: TWiT 99: Happy Towel Day
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, Patrick Norton, and John C. Dvorak

Borrowing Wi-Fi is a crime, Dell arrives at Wal-Mart, and Norton crashes Chinese PCs....

Thanks to AOL Radio for the bandwidth for this show.

Running time: 1:13:56

item.title: TWiT 96: 09 F9 11 02 9D 74 E3 58 D8 41 56 C5 63 56 88 C0
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, Andy Ihnatko, Patrick Norton, Jaqui Cheng, and John C. Dvorak

Guest: Kevin Rose

The Digg revolt, inside and out, why a Microsoft Yahoo merger makes no sense, and the My Space candidate...

Thanks to AOL Radio for the bandwidth for this show. The TWiT opening theme is by Mark Blasco. The closing theme is by Ashley Witt. TWiT album art by Nitrozac.

Running time: 1:11:00

item.title: TWiT 81: The Early Years
item.description:
Hosts: Leo Laporte, John C. Dvorak, Patrick Norton, Kevin Rose, David Prager, Robert Heron

This Christmas Eve we present another special compilation. This time it's a collection of moments from the first ten TWiTs - TWiT 0, the pilot, through TWiT 9. Thanks so much to Alfred Chan of Hong Kong for creating this show for us. We hope you enjoy it. TWiT will be back next week with a fresh show looking back at 2006 and ahead at 2007. Happy holidays and all the best for 2007!

Thanks to AOL Radio for the bandwidth for this show.

Running time: 1:15:03
item.author: leo@leoville.com (Leo Laporte)

item.itunes:subtitle: The best of TWiT 0-9...
